title: I’m Troubled by the Prince’s Love ~Reincarnated Heroine, The Otome Game Struggle~ - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Smut
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Childhood Friends   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Younger Brothers
author: Tsukigami Saki   月神サキ
description:
Sylvia was reborn into the world of an otome game.

“And not only that, I became the heroine of an R18 one?!”

Sylvia decided that she would evade all the destruction flags and live in peace.

“I’ll do my best to survive this game,” she said.

However, the prince, a capture target she wasn’t aiming for, became fond of her and began to disturb all of her events.

“Although he is handsome, this is different from I’ve planned.

In the first place, I excluded him because he has a terrible setting!”

Now cornered, what will Sylvia do?>
